title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Donate
body: Donate       Do you have a specific project or event you would like to see funded at the Natchez Trace Parkway? If you make a donation directly to the park, the entire gift will be used for the purpose you identify in accordance with National Park Service policies and missions. No administrative cost is deducted from your gift, and the full amount will be spent as you intend. To make a donation, please contact the Natchez Trace Parkway at 662-680-4025 for more information, or send a check payable to the National Park Service with a letter indicating your preferred project or purpose to:  Natchez Trace Parkway 2680 Natchez Trace Parkway Tupelo, MS 38804  Anonymous donations are accepted at donation boxes along the Parkway, including:  Mount Locust Contact Station, milepost 15.5 Parkway Visitor Center, milepost 266
